name: Stick Stealth
description:
Sneak through a heavily guarded warehouse to steal the brief case!
:Controls:
Movement : W and S
Dash : Shift
Crouch/Crawl : Ctrl
Reveal Enemy Intentions : Space
Exit to Menu : Esc:Goal:Sneak or sprint around the warehouse until you find the briefcase laying on a desk hide under the desk or stand near it to steal it!:Note:Only one level currentlyNo audio yet
